short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Demo app to run abitrary SSJS code from the browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Execute JavaScript code on the server to retrieve collections and entities either directly or through relationships from a Wakanda Server datastore (database). 

Note: 
Wakanda provides a REST API and a Client-Side Framework with its own API. 
The goal of this demo app is to easily discover and test its Server-Side JavaScript NoSQL API.
